Detailed Description

Test sentence split in JMA analysis.

Below is the usage examples to split the sentences from "INPUT" to "OUTPUT" with each sentence in one line, the "DICT_PATH" is the dictionary path, which is "../db/ipadic/bin_eucjp" defautly. 

 The character encoding of "INPUT" should be the same to that of "DICT_PATH"
 $./jma_split_sentence INPUT OUTPUT [--dict DICT_PATH]
